article.text:
Beauty


♞ A passionate kiss will face 34 muscles tense, make the skin more smooth, the blood supply of the facial skin, increased by 30% , helps improve facial muscle tissue, play the role of beauty.

Mouthpiece


♞ Increased salivation kiss process. Saliva contains calcium and trace elements, after being absorbed by the enamel can prevent tooth decay; kissing process, saliva pH is neutral, but also can prevent dental disease. Saliva natural antibiotic - enzymes can be controlled by the number of bacteria in the mouth. Saliva also useful for wound healing growth genes.

免疫


♞ Our saliva contains large amounts of bacteria. 20 % of bacteria varies. Kissing object in the mouth , bacteria once added to the others, these microorganisms will produce different responses . So can stimulate a person's immune system to produce specific antibodies.

减肥


♞ Kissing a minute, can consume 26 calories. Kiss male heartbeat can be increased to 110 beats per minute, heart rate can be increased to 108 females per minute, and then the blood circulation. These changes mobilize the body's cells fuel - adenosine triphosphate easily burn fat. Up to French kiss calories consumed.

止痛


♞ The more passionate kiss, the body will secrete more endorphins. Endorphin hormone is a good anesthetic, a hormone produced by kissing can achieve the effect of a painkiller.

减压


♞ Adrenocorticotropic hormone or a stress hormone, since it can prevent the formation of kissing adrenocorticotropic hormone , so kissing can effectively help you calm down from the tense mood, like kissing people are usually optimistic, but also because of this reason. Kissing three times a day can make you 24 hours are in a romantic and pleasant atmosphere.
